system.availability: A user that possesses this tome gains +20 to Scholatic Lore (Heraldry, Imperial Creed, Judgement, Legend, Philosophy, and Tactica Imperialis) Tests. Once per session, the user may spend a fate point to automatically succeed at unjamming a weapon or enacting a minor repair with 1d5 DoS.
system.cost: A Tome Written in High Gothic that covers much on archeotech, military tradition, and faith. Relics are unique, one of a kind items, they must be earned as opposed to acquired.
